benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/paymentMethods - Add a payment method

covered: Valid Payload: Creates a payment method successfully with required fields (TC01) and minimal payload (TC11).
Invalid Payload / Malformed Body: Handles malformed JSON (TC12) and missing required fields (TC13).
Large Payloads: Supports maximum size payloads (TC10).
Validation/Security: Checks invalid accountId format (TC14), SQL injection (TC19), and XSS in pluginInfo (TC20).
Authorization/Headers: Handles missing/invalid auth tokens (TC17) and missing X-Killbill-CreatedBy header (TC16).
Not Found / Non-existent Accounts: Returns 404 for non-existent account (TC15).
Query Parameters / Options: Tests combining isDefault, payAllUnpaidInvoices, controlPluginName, pluginProperty (TC02, TC03, TC04, TC08).
Integration / Downstream: Downstream sync and plugin data handling (TC26, TC27).
Edge Cases: Unexpected query parameters are ignored (TC09).
Audit / Response: 201 Created with Location header and audit fields reflected when applicable (TC01, TC05).
Regression: Handling of empty pluginProperty (TC24), backward compatibility with older clients (TC25).
Concurrency / Duplicates: Prevents duplicates under concurrent submissions (TC23).
Error Coverage: 400/404/500/503 status codes covered across tests.
gaps: Rate Limiting / Throttling: No explicit tests for rate limiting on POST /paymentMethods.
Caching: POST responses are not typically cached; no caching behavior tests for this endpoint.
Idempotency: No dedicated idempotency-key based tests to guarantee idempotent POST on retries.
recommendations: Add dedicated rate-limiting test (new TC31) to verify throttling under bursts.
Add idempotency-key tests to ensure idempotent POST semantics (new test).
Add GET caching tests for caching headers (ETag/Cache-Control) where applicable.
Clarify error semantics (400 vs 422) for certain invalid payloads (TC19/TC20).
